Name: Limited Liability
Ingredients: 5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: Reminiscent of a honeyed Daiquiri but without the rum and freshened with a cleansing vodka citrusy bite.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly, then revisited and rescued in 2025.
Nutrition: One serving of Limited Liability contains 95 calories
